**if** $prev_{n+1} > prev_n$ **then**

|           $prevalence \space ratio = (prev_{n+1} - prev_n)/(prev_{max})$
<br>
**if** $prev_{n+1} < prev_n$ **then**

|           $prevalence \space ratio = 1-((prev_n - prev_{n+1})/(prev_{max}))$
<br>
**if** $prev_{n+1} = prev_n$ **then** 

|           $prevalence \space ratio = 0$

<br>
<br>

**if** $prev_{n+1} > prev_n$ **then**

|           $prevalence \space ratio = (prev_{n+1} - prev_n)/(prev_{max} - prev_n)$
<br>
**if** $prev_{n+1} < prev_n$ **then**

|           $prevalence \space ratio = 1-((prev_n - prev_{n+1})/(prev_n))$
<br>
**if** $prev_{n+1} = prev_n$ **then** 

|           $prevalence \space ratio = 0$
